subject: Order error
description_text:
I ordered a pedal set with the 3 motors, I received the pedal set but not
the motors!

conversations.body_text: Hi martin mcfly,  Hello, please provide your order number so I can confirm it.
您好，我们会尽快为您重新发放。
Hi martin mcfly,  Hello, we will reissue it to you as soon as possible.
Hi martin mcfly, Hello, we will reissue it to you as soon as possible
ID 号为 8886 和 8887 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单8886  
      主题: Problème commande  
      描述:  J'ai commander un pédalier simsonn plus x, avec 3 Motor, je n'est reçu que les pédal !    
 1ZJ455510435485521 le numéro de suivi

合并来自工单8887  
      主题: Order problem  
      描述:  
You sent me the pedal assembly, but not the motors!   
  1ZJ455510435485521

Your order was originally scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to transportation delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They have now arrived at the warehouse, and we are processing them for storage and arranging DHL express shipping. We will update you with the tracking number tomorrow.

So tomorrow I'll have the follow-up for my second product?

Le lun. 22 déc. 2025, 14:10, service@simsonn.com

Hi martin mcfly,    We apologize for the inconvenience. We have reshipped the haptics from our German warehouse.  ​https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=CE326636631DE

Ok, thank you.

Le mar. 23 déc. 2025, 11:15, service@simsonn.com
